title: Delhi Increases Minimum Wages for Skilled and Unskilled Workers
summary: The Delhi government has announced an increase in minimum wages, with unskilled workers now entitled to Rs 18,456 per month and skilled workers to receive Rs 22,411 per month.
content:
The Delhi government has implemented new minimum wage rates for workers in the national capital. Under the revised structure, unskilled workers will receive a monthly minimum wage of Rs 18,456, while skilled workers' minimum wages have been set at Rs 22,411.

This wage revision represents the government's efforts to ensure fair compensation for workers across different skill categories in Delhi.

## Key Wage Rates:
* Unskilled workers: Rs 18,456 per month
* Skilled workers: Rs 22,411 per month

source.title: Minimum wages hiked in Delhi: Unskilled workers to get Rs 18,456, skilled Rs 22,411
